alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 20 at 2:25PM AKDT until October 21 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting to 30 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Arctic Plains and Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will cause low visibility and make travel very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting 30 to 40 mph are causing visibility of one half mile or less in blowing snow. The strong winds and blowing will continue through Saturday. Winds will gradually decrease Saturday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range
